name: buzzball
description:
Control a plasma ball in a fast paced game. Avoid rockets and dodge lasers to survive. Collect coins to complete the level and get some hard-earned cash to buy lots of upgrades!

Controls:

  • Mouse to move
  • Left mouse button to fire
  • Right mouse button for alternative fire (when upgraded)
  • Ctrl or space to anchor in place (which makes it a lot easier to fire)
  • M button to mute (see settings to only mute music)
